txt_en: "There are no seven wonders of the world in the eyes of a child. There are seven million. "
txt_cn: 在孩子们眼中，这世上不是只有七大奇迹，而是有七百万种奇迹。
author: Walt Streightiff

txt_en: A great obstacle to happiness is to expect too much happiness.
txt_cn: 获得幸福的一大障碍是对幸福期望太高。
author: Bernard de Fontenelle

txt_en: The verse of Qu Ping shines as bright as sun and moon, while palaces of Chu vanish like dreams at noon.
txt_cn: 屈平辞赋悬日月，楚王台榭空山丘。
author: 《江上吟》（许渊冲 译）

txt_en: The two things in life you are in total control over are your attitude and your effort.
txt_cn: 生活中你可以全权掌控的两件事：你的态度和你付出的努力。
author: Billy Cox
